This is client section. You are logged in as administrator, nothing to see on this page.

Freelance Manager allows you to manage your freelance design and development clients with ease. With comprehensive project management and billing tools, Thanks to Freelance Manager you, your project team and your clients will always be on the same page.
There are no projects for selected Month...
There are no project transactions for current Year...
There are no service transactions for current Year...
Congratulations, you don't have any pending projects
Here you can update your staff profile.
Admin has full rights. Staff has access to whatever is assigned to them.
Here you can add new staff.
Send welcome email to this user.
Here you can manage your staff members.
Here you can view your payment history.
You don't have any payments yet...
You cannot delete main Administrator account!
Here you can update your client profile.
Here you can add new client.
Billing currency used for this client. If left empty gateway default currency will be used. Enter currency such as CAD, USD, EUR

Here you can manage your clients. Click on [+] to Add/Deduct Credit from client account. Note: Deleting active client will also delete all the projects, tasks, invoices etc.. assigned under the same client.
Enter the amount that you want to Add/Deduct from this client's account. To deduct, enter negative value. E.g.: -3.95
You don't have any clients yet...

Here you can make modifications to currently selected invoice.
On Hold, invoices are not shown to a client.
Are you sure you want to send this invoice?
Here you can add invoice to currently selected project.
Valid values are: Day(s) Allowable range is 1 to 90. Week(s) Allowable range is 1 to 52. Month(s) Allowable range is 1 to 24. Year(s) Allowable range is 1 to 5
Note is displayed at the bottom of your invoice. You can enter your company policy, or any other info.
This comment is NEVER displayed to client or included in the final invoice. It's for internal purpose only.
Here you can manage your project invoices. Note: Deleting active invoice will remove all paid/unpaid entries.

Changes made here will affect the settings of Freelance Manager.
This is your website slogan which will appear near your website heading
Insert full URL WITHOUT any trailing slash (e.g. http://www.yourdomain.com)
This is the main email notices will be sent to. It is also used as the from 'email' when emailing other automatic emails
Invoice starting sequence. You can choose any combination of letters/numbers
Quote starting sequence. You can choose any combination of letters/numbers
Illegal file type. Only jpg and png file types allowed.
If no logo exists, Company Name will be used instead.
Logo used for invoices and print media
Locales are used for displaying dates in your own language format.
If Yes clients will be able to register, otherwise manual registration is required
This is your Tax/Vat/Business number that will appear on all your invoices
Whether to display clients full name or username
Enter coma , separated file extensions, no spaces.
Default number of items used for pagination
Enter your currency such as CAD, USD, EUR
Enter your currency symbol such as $, €, £.
Number of days, before each reminder is dispatched.
Use PHP Mailer or SMTP protocol for sending emails
Choose Yes if your server requires SSL connection
Mail server port ( Can be 25, 26. 456 for GMAIL. 587 for Yahoo ). Ask your host if uncertain.
Ask your hosting company for sandmail path if unsure. Usually: /usr/sbin/sendmail -t -i
Here you can update your gateway settings.
When in live mode all transactions will be processed in real time
Only active gateways will be available for payment methods.
Here you can manage your list of available gateways.
You are missing all gateways. You need to reinstall them manually

Here you can manage your custom fields. To reorder items click and drag item reorder handle, position it where you want it. Position will be updated automatically. Warning: Deleting custom field holding active data, will also remove all data associated with the same field.
Here you can update your custom field.
Here you can add new custom field.
You don't have any custom fields yet...

Make sure your database is backed up frequently. Click on Create backup to manually backup your database. The backups are stored in the [/admin/backups/] folder and can be downloaded from the list below. Your most recent backup is highlighted. Make sure you download your most recent backup, and delete the rest.
Are you sure you want to restore database? This action cannot be undone!!!
Here you can update your news announcement.

This option allows you to select a start date for this News Announcement. This will be displayed as the publish date to website visitors. If you select a future date, the content item will not appear on the website until that date.
Here you can add news announcement.
Here you can manage your news announcements.
You don't have any news announcement yet...

Here you can create your form layout. You can place up to 4 fields per row, thus creating unique form layout. Click on Add New Row button to add new row. Click on [ICOADD] to add new field. Double click on existing field to remove it. Edit existing field by selecting it from Available Fields list. Make sure to save form layout once done editing.
Click on the field name to insert
Are you sure you want to remove this element?
Here you can view submitted form data.
You don't have any form data yet...
You don't have any fields yet, please add...
Here you can manage your forms. First create new form, then click on Edit Fields to create fields and layout.
Here you can view your rendered form.
You don't have any forms yet...
Requires x number of items selected.
Enter allowable file types separated by coma.
Enter allowable file size in MB.
You can specify individual color values in hex format. E.g. 000000,FFFFFF,E9E9E9
Must Contain at LEAST x Characters.
Here you can update your current form.
Only available if Show Delivery Time is set to Yes

Select payment options for this service
Please select at least one payment option

To add a new language, make a copy of /lang/en/ folder into /lang/fr/. Now you can start translating language phrases usin Language Manager built in editor, or you can open xml files directly into your text editor, and modify from there. Just make sure that xml files are saved in utf-8 formatn without BOM. This example explains adding French language, you can use two letter country abbrivation to add your own language, such as /lang/es/, /lang/de/, /lang/pt/ etc...
Here you can update your existing language phrases.
Selected language file does not exist

The information displayed below is collected from a variety of locations, and summarized here so that you may be able to conveniently find some of the information required when trying to diagnose a problem or request help with your FM installation.
Please enter your valid username and password to login into your dashboard.

Enter your username and email address below to reset your password. A verification token will be sent to your email address. Once you have received the token, you will be able to choose a new password for your account.
You have successfully changed your password. Please check your email for further info!
There was an error during the process. Please contact the administrator.
Please fill out the form below to register your account.
You have successfully registered. Please check your email for further instructions.
There was an error during registration process. Please contact the administrator...
Here you can make changes to your profile

We've made it easy for you to manage your billing, projects, and to communicate with our staff. Check the Projects page to see if there are any items that need your attention. If the project manager sends an item for you to review, you'll be able to Approve or Reject the submission from this page. All client announcements are viewable from the Messages page.
Ooops the selected project does not exist. Back to Projects
This tool allows you to upload a file related to current project. The file will be stored in the project file for the staff to use. You will not be able to modify the file once it is submitted.
Ooops the selected project does not exist. Back to Projects
Monitor project progress and view notes or updates.
Please review each of the items below. These are important items that need your attention.
Here you can make payments to your outstanding invoices
Thank you, your payment has been processed.
Use available credit towards this invoice payment.
If you don't wish to pay full amount at this time you can enter different value. Change the value before selecting Payment Processor.
Payment amount cannot be zero or empty or greater than actual Amount Pending
You have selected an invalid payment method. Please try again
Thank you, invoice has been paid in full
Thank you, invoice has been partially paid

Thank you! We have received your payment. Your transaction has been completed, and a receipt for your purchase has been emailed to you. Someone from our team will be in touch with your shortly.
